=== [ topic ][ install ] ===
[ --- start ---- ]
1. download
https://code.google.com/p/go/wiki/Downloads?tm=2

2. extract
`tar -C /usr/local -xzf go$VERSION.$OS-$ARCH.tar.gz`

3. in ~/.bashrc, insert:
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin

4. create a sample app and compile
`go run hello.go`
[ ---  end  ---- ]

=== [ topic ][ build ] ===
[ --- start ---- ]
set -o nounset
set -o errexit
set -o pipefail

go build -o apptranslator_app *.go
./apptranslator_app
